data.description: The U.S. Department of Energy's Office of Environmental Management (DOE-EM) offers internships to help develop our future workforce in critically important areas of science, engineering, technology, and mathematics (STEM). DOE-EM summer internships take place at selected DOE national laboratories. Interns will complete research projects that are relevant to EMâ€™s ongoing mission. Students will also be involved in enrichment activities provided by the host laboratory.
